participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to share experiences and connect with others.
participant_1.background: I am a gold medalist Olympian. I work out four hours a day. My favorite color is yellow. I love Italian food and garlic bread. Gymnastics is my favorite sport.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Curious and thoughtful, enjoys exploring nature and studying human behavior.
participant_2.background: I am an avid kayaker. I am also a graduate student. I enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. My parents taught me survival skills. I walk dogs for a living.
